definition: in computer science, the mechanical, magnetic, electronic, and electrical components making up a computer system
details:
noun
- in computer science, the mechanical, magnetic, electronic, and electrical components making up a computer system
= example: in computer science, the mechanical, magnetic, electronic, and electrical components making up a computer system
= synonyms: computer hardware
- major items of military weaponry (as tanks or missile)
- instrumentalities (tools or implements) made of metal
= synonyms: ironware
